data.actual_result: The circle isn't aligned vertically with text, leaving a too small padding with the left border of the screen
data.expected_result: The circle should be aligned with text just like voice volume slider when it's to minimum
data.short_description: When slowmode is in Off position, the circle of the slider isn't aligned
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to channel settings - Make sure slowmode is off - Observe slider
